# SWIFT Messaging Fraud

_List of useful resources related to the SWIFT Messaging Fraud topic._

## General information

General information about SWIFT and SWIFT protocol:

- [SWIFT.com](https://www.swift.com/)
- [ISO20022.org](https://www.iso20022.org/)
- [ISO 20022: CBR slides](https://docviewer.yandex.ru/view/0/?page=31&*%3D&lang=ru)
- [SWIFT protocol: message types](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SWIFT_message_types#Overview_of_SWIFT_MT_categories)

## SWIFT Fraud Cases

Information about fraud cases and main anti-fraud approaches related to B2B financial crimes:

- https://www.swift.com/your-needs/financial-crime-cyber-security/financial-fraud/types-fraud
- https://www.netguardians.ch/fraud-cases/
- https://www.swift.com/ru/swift-resource/202426/download
- https://www.bernardgrupp.com/post/what-is-swift-messaging-fraud
- https://info.netguardians.ch/form/white-paper-the-top-banking-fraud-types-to-watch-in-2021
- https://info.netguardians.ch/form/az-of-internal-banking-fraud

## SWIFT Fraud Prevention

- https://blog.netguardians.ch/fraud-detection-on-swift-without-the-need-to-configure-any-rule
- https://www.finastra.com/solutions/transaction-banking/financial-messaging-services/fusion-fraud-prevention-service
